thread.title: MOVES-Intermediate Capital appoints global chief risk officer
thread.title_full: MOVES-Intermediate Capital appoints global chief risk officer | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: MOVES-Intermediate Capital appoints global chief risk officer
text:
Sept 16 Asset management firm Intermediate Capital Group said it hired Bindesh Savjani as global chief risk officer from Aberdeen Asset Management.
Savjani will be based in London and will report to Chief Financial Officer Philip Keller.
Savjani has previously worked with Aviva Investors and Ernst & Young. (Reporting by Anannya Pramanick in Bengaluru)
